name: rockPaperScissors

scripts.setup: npm install -g gulp && gem install scss_lint && npm install && npm run install-typescript && npm run install-protractor && npm run install-karma && gulp && npm run test
scripts.install-typescript: npm install -g typescript && npm install -g typings && typings install
scripts.install-protractor: npm install -g concurrently && npm install -g protractor && npm install -g webdriver-manager && webdriver-manager update
scripts.install-karma: npm install -g karma && npm install -g karma-jasmine && npm install -g jasmine-core && npm install -g karma-chrome-launcher && npm install -g karma-firefox-launcher && npm install -g karma-phantomjs-launcher

keywords: rpsApplicaiton test e2e rock paper scissors
author: Lukas Kalcok
